verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: told] [ARG2: top auto executives] [ARGM-LOC: at a meeting in the White House] [ARG1: that he wants them to build “ millions more cars ” in the U.S.]
President Donald Trump told top auto executives at a meeting in the White House that [ARG0: he] [V: wants] [ARG1: them to build “ millions more cars ” in the U.S.]
President Donald Trump told top auto executives at a meeting in the White House that he wants [ARG0: them] to [V: build] “ [ARG1: millions more cars] ” [ARGM-LOC: in the U.S.]
